original_text: And it came to pass, after they were departed, that they came up out of the well, and went and told king David, and said unto David, Arise, and pass quickly over the water: for thus hath Ahithophel counselled against you.
korean_text: 그들이 간 후에 두 사람이 우물에서 올라와서 다윗 왕에게 가서 다윗 왕에게 말하여 이르되 당신들은 일어나 빨리 물을 건너가소서 아히도벨이 당신들을 해하려고 이러이러하게 계략을 세웠나이다

sentences.original_text: that they came up out of the well
and went and told king David
and pass quickly over the water
for thus hath Ahithophel counselled against you
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아히도셀이 당신을 해하라고 이렇게 꾀했기 때문입니다
